name: ext_R3_ExplanationOfBenefit_addItem
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ExplanationOfBenefit.addItem for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ExplanationOfBenefit.addItem from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExplanationOfBenefit|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R2.

binding.description: Benefit subcategories such as: oral-basic, major, glasses

element.definition: If this is an actual service or product line, ie. not a Group, then use code to indicate the Professional Service or Product supplied (eg. CTP, HCPCS,USCLS,ICD10, NCPDP,DIN,ACHI,CCI). If a grouping item then use a group code to indicate the type of thing being grouped eg. 'glasses' or 'compound'.
